TopicTitle: Images, and the disappearance of the Imgur button

Articles.Content: Could someone please explain (or let me know of an existing explanation if there is one) why the post editor no longer has a way to add imgur albums, and also how I might go about adding images to posts in future?

TL;DR: The embeds broke when imgur changed stuff, the button has been disabled until a fix can be implemented.

In the meantime you can still embed single images (whether from imgur or another host), just get the url ending in .jpg, .png or whatever and paste it into the editor and it will embed automagically.
